mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_address, user_phone, user_email, user_birth) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirth})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.user_pw userPw, u.user_name userName, u.user_address userAddress, u.user_phone userPhone, u.user_email userEmail, u.user_birth userBirth, a.role userRole FROM User u JOIN Auth a ON u.user_id = a.user_id
